# Vandelay

> An always-on AI agent platform built on Agno.

Vandelay gives you a self-hosted AI agent that runs 24/7 with memory, tools, scheduling, and multi-channel access.

## Docs

- [Home](index.md): Overview, features, quick install
- [Getting Started](getting-started/index.md): What is Vandelay, architecture overview
- [Installation](getting-started/installation.md): Prerequisites, uv install, platform notes
- [Quickstart](getting-started/quickstart.md): Install → onboard → first message in <5 min

## Concepts

- [Architecture](concepts/architecture.md): System diagram, component overview, data flow
- [Agents](concepts/agents.md): Agent lifecycle, workspace files, system prompt assembly
- [Teams](concepts/teams.md): Supervisor model, specialist delegation, team modes
- [Memory](concepts/memory.md): Session history, agentic memory, workspace files
- [Knowledge](concepts/knowledge.md): RAG pipeline, embedders, vector store
- [Channels](concepts/channels.md): Terminal, Telegram, WhatsApp, WebSocket
- [Safety](concepts/safety.md): Safety modes, blocked patterns, sandboxing

## Guides

- [Your First Team](guides/first-team.md): Set up a team with specialist members
- [Custom Tools](guides/custom-tool.md): Build a toolkit with @tool or Toolkit subclass
- [Telegram Setup](guides/telegram-setup.md): BotFather → config → webhook → test
- [Google Services](guides/google-services.md): OAuth setup for Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Sheets
- [Scheduling](guides/scheduling.md): Cron jobs, heartbeat, active hours
- [Agent Templates](guides/agent-templates.md): 14 starter templates, customization
- [Workspace Files](guides/workspace-files.md): SOUL.md, USER.md, AGENTS.md, and more

## Tools

- [Tool Catalog](tools/index.md): 100+ tools grouped by category
- [Built-in Tools](tools/built-in.md): Shell, File, Python, Camoufox, Scheduler, Notify

## CLI Reference

- [Overview](cli/index.md): All commands and global options
- [onboard](cli/onboard.md): Interactive setup wizard
- [start](cli/start.md): Start server and terminal chat
- [config](cli/config.md): Interactive configuration editor
- [tools](cli/tools.md): Enable, disable, list, search tools
- [cron](cli/cron.md): Manage cron jobs
- [knowledge](cli/knowledge.md): Manage RAG corpus
- [memory](cli/memory.md): View and manage agent memory
- [daemon](cli/daemon.md): Install and manage background daemon

## Reference

- [Configuration](configuration/index.md): Full config.json schema, env vars, examples

## Deployment

- [Overview](deployment/index.md): Deployment options and architecture
- [VPS Setup](deployment/vps.md): Ubuntu/Debian install, systemd, Nginx, TLS
- [Security](deployment/security.md): API keys, JWT, Telegram lock, safety modes
- [Troubleshooting](deployment/troubleshooting.md): Common issues, debugging, FAQ
